testcase.name: Hook log redacts user info in source uniform resource identifier
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Hook log redacts user info in source uniform resource identifier Given I have an initialized corpus at "corpus" ... passed in 0.001s And the corpus "corpus" has a configured hook "add-tags" for hook point "after_ingest" with tags "x" ... passed in 0.000s When I ingest an item via the Python application programming interface into corpus "corpus" with source uniform resource identifier "http://user:pass@example.com/private" and filename "note.txt" ... passed in 0.003s Then the corpus "corpus" hook logs do not include "user:pass@" ... passed in 0.000s And the corpus "corpus" hook logs include "example.com" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
